markdown:
IC Design Engineers Career Talk
===============================

by [ecepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/ecepic/ "Posts by ecepic")
 | Mar 7, 2017 | [ECE](https://fke.utm.my/category/ece/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/oppstar.png)

Oppstar Technology will visiting FKE on **16th March 2017**.  Oppstar Technology has been collaborating with oversea S&P500 base company into IC design activities; and moving into 2017,  Oppstar Technology plan to recruit a group of junior E&E engineers and experience design engineers recruitment to fuel our 2017 entire IC design and product development front preparation. There will be a group of selected engineers expected to sent to US for project OJT (on job training).

Don’t miss this opportunity. Below are the arrangement during the career talk;

*   **10.00 – 11.00 a.m.**: Guest lecture/career talk for students in the Digital VLSI Design course (3rd and 4th year students); lecturer Dr Suhaila Isaak.
    
*   **11.15 a.m. – 12.30 p.m**.: Discussion on 3D project with Dr Al-Hadi and Dr Nasir Shaikh Husin
    
*   **2.00 p.m. – 4.00 p.m.**: Walk-in interview
